reports.summary: Root cause identified: Commands load 78-86KB during routing (39-43% of budget) due to premature command file loading, context duplication, and large TODO.md. Recommended 4-phase fix plan reduces routing context to <6% through file splitting, deduplication, and selective loading.

plans.summary: 4-phase implementation plan (28-42 hours total). Phase 1: Eliminate orchestrator duplication (2-4 hours, 56KB savings, LOW risk). Phase 2: Split command files (8-12 hours, 72-104KB savings). Phase 3: Selective TODO.md loading (6-10 hours, 107KB savings). Phase 4: Aggressive deduplication (12-16 hours, 56-72KB savings). Total savings: 178-186KB (62-64% reduction).

summaries.summary: Phase 3 complete: Selective TODO.md loading implemented across all 4 workflow commands. Context reduced by 40KB (91% reduction). Total savings: 96KB (Phase 1: 56KB, Phase 3: 40KB). Phase 2 deferred (requires orchestrator refactor).
